settings.content: With 4 excellent presets and priority customer support. See the theme [documentation](http://www.shopifythemes.net/collections/shopify-themes/products/mr-parker) or [check out the support docs](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk). If you need to reach us please use our [support site](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk) or [email us](mailto:create@undergroundmedia.co.uk)

Choose Linklist Of Collections to Display

settings.content: Important Instagram user feed setup requires an account authorisation to display your images - [click here](http://support.undergroundmedia.co.uk/customer/portal/articles/1483035-instagram-feed) for instructions
To use the Sidebar: In your admin for each collection choose template: collection.sidebar

settings.label: Show product info only on image hover ( beneath image if unchecked )

settings.content: These options rely on your use of Product Tags.... You can enter anything in these areas providing that it exists as a product tag. To work effectively the tags must match case and spelling and all must be comma separated

settings.label: Use Swatch buttons - defaults to dropdowns if unchecked

settings.content: These popups contain additional content on your product pages which load in lightboxes - think of including size guides, returns information, delivery information etc... Simply create some pages of content in your Shopify admin and choose which page to display in each window The titles of the pages that you select will automatically be shown as titles to make sure they are logical... Returns, Delivery etc..
Add Social Media URLS and Handles
Please ensure for all Social Media Links ( excluding Twitter ) you must include: http:// at the beginning of the address - all links will open in a new window
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (Do tell where the money is).
